text.en: Build a robot that can dance through the challenge field in circles. Your task is to make your robot turn as many cirlces as possible from the start line to other end of the challenge field.

Your robot cannot step outside the field.
You have 5 minutes for the task.
You have got 3 trials.

Your robot could drive 10 circles. = Good job! Let's try again.
Your robot could drive 15 circles. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
Your robot could drive 20+ circles. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Your robot could drive 10 circles. = 5 points
Your robot could drive 15 circles. = 10 points
Your robot could drive 20+ circles. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
